thread.title: Rahul Khanna Tweets About Breaking-Up, And Here's What The Internet Has To Say

title: Rahul Khanna Tweets About Breaking-Up, And Here's What The Internet Has To Say
text:
A couple of days ago, the mysterious Rahul Khanna tweeted the following: Breaking up sucks. Especially when you've been together for over two decades. ðŸ’”ðŸ˜¢ â€” Rahul Khanna (@R_Khanna) February 25, 2017 
For someone who isn't all that vocal about his personal life, and has stayed out of controversies or speculations, this one was a big confession! Obviously, his fans had things to say... . @R_Khanna Sir breaking up after 2 decades? That is like skipping a YouTube ad after having watched it almost till the end. ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ â€” Neeche Se Topper (@NeecheSeTopper) February 25, 2017 @R_Khanna Oh no! That sounds... !Hang in there, there'll be another sunrise soon! :) â€” Nidhi Thakur (@ChhotaRecharge) February 25, 2017 @R_Khanna This calls for nutella and peanut butter sandwhich at midnight followed by hard gym session next day â€” priyanka rai (@priyankaphysio) February 25, 2017 @R_Khanna bro old monk is a good healer in my view!!!! â€” Chirag Bhatia (@ChiragBhatia15) February 25, 2017 @R_Khanna ,well,well we can't read someone's mind!!!!Example,,Breakup after 6 years old relationship Not to worry â€” HITESH PARMAR (@hiteshparmar99) February 25, 2017 @R_Khanna monogamy isn't natural. Are you into boys though?
